segments.text: Hello ? Mr . Bernie . My name is Lisa . I hope I ’ m not disturbing you . I just heard about your daughter . I wanted to call you and tell you how much we ’ ll miss her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry . I think you are calling the wrong person . My name is not Mr . Bernie .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? That ’ s odd . I ’ m so sorry if I ’ Ve bothered you .
segments.speaker: S2
